review: The Amazon Fire TV works great and is quite user friendly! I am also a Amazon Prime member, which is almost a requirement. Imagine my disappointment when I tried to watch a movie that was over 2 decades old and they expected me to pay for it! The more I looked into what I could watch for my membership, it was more than a little disheartening. Netflex gives you more for $7.99 a month. Poorly done, Amazon. I can only hope you come to your senses and give your paying members a little more.
author: Cynthia Kaiser Mullen
